newsitem.title: AUSTRIA: SOCCER-AUSTRIA DEFENDER FEIERSINGER MISSES LATVIA GAME.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-AUSTRIA DEFENDER FEIERSINGER MISSES LATVIA GAME.

text.p: Austria will be without injured Wolfgang Feiersinger against European group four rivals Latvia in a World Cup qualifier in Vienna on Saturday.
The Borussia Dortmund defender has still not fully recovered from a torn muscle received in a recent Bundesliga match.
He was replaced by Goran Kartalija of Linzer ASK in the squad named by coach Herbert Prohaska on Monday.
Werder Bremen forward Heimo Pfeifenberger is back after missing the last qualifier against Sweden through injury.
Goalkeepers - Michael Konsel (Rapid Vienna), Franz Wohlfahrt (VfB Stuttgart).
Defenders - Goran Kartalija (Linzer ASK), Michael Hatz (Reggiana), Anton Pfeffer (Austria Vienna), Peter Schoettel (Rapid Vienna), Markus Schopp (Hamburger SV)

Midfielders - Andreas Heraf (Rapid Vienna), Dietmar Kuehbauer (Rapid Vienna), Peter Stoeger (Rapid Vienna), Andreas Herzog (Werder Bremen), Arnold Wetl (FC Porto), Stefan Marasek (SC Freiburg), Adi Huetter (Salzburg)
Forwards - Heimo Pfeifenberger (Werder Bremen), Toni Polster (FC Cologne), Dieter Ramusch (Casino Graz), Herfried Sabitzer (Casino Graz).
